subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Billy Wagner, or any closer, is to succeed, he has no choice but to forget about a poor outing, even one that cost the Mets a superb opportunity to take control of the series.
snippet: If Billy Wagner, or any closer, is to succeed, he has no choice but to forget about a poor outing, even one that cost the Mets a superb opportunity to take control of the series.
